titleInfo.title: Gift Containers for Shipment to Armed Forces Overseas

physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 16 x 20 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on the back of the photograph: ''L.-R, Ben Blumberg - 'Gift Containers for shipment to Armed Forces Overseas,' Sydney [sic] Jacobs, Mailed out packages of things the servicemen needed to all members of B'nai B'rith who were in the service.''

mods.abstract: Ben Blumberg and Sidney Jacobs, dressed in suits, stand on either side of a truck loaded with packages for B'nai B'rith servicemen during World War II. Ben Blumberg and Sydney Jacobs were leaders in the Denver chapter of B'nai B'rith. The truck is from Tom's Express, a moving company and is parked in front of an inn.

name.namePart: Independent Order of B'nai B'rith Lodge 171 (Denver, Colorado)

mods.accessCondition: Copyright restrictions may apply. User is responsible for all copyright compliance.
